title: Indonesia: an Alternative Lifestyle
creator_credit: Experimental Film and Television Fund and Leigh Tilson
brief_description: A non-narrated film that contrasts behind-the-scenes life in both rural and urban Indonesia with the view of the country as seen by foreign tourists.
creator_credit_for_label: Experimental Film and Television Fund and Leigh Tilson
description: A non-narrated film that contrasts behind-the-scenes life in both rural and urban Indonesia with the view of the country as seen by foreign tourists.
